Security Settings

Configure backend connection and security preferences

HTTPS Required for KRA TIMS

The KRA TIMS backend requires HTTPS connections. Please configure your backend URL with https:// protocol.

Example: https://20.224.40.56:8088

Backend Configuration
Configure the backend server URL and port for KRA TIMS integration and other services
Loading configuration...
Usage Notes
Important information about backend configuration
  • The backend URL is used for KRA TIMS integration and other external services
  • Make sure your backend server is running and accessible before testing the connection
  • Port is optional and only needed if your backend uses a non-standard port
  • Configuration is stored in the database and will persist across sessions
  • Test the connection after saving to ensure the configuration is correct
  • BHF ID and Device Token are assigned during the onboarding process
